short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the load time of a web page in the toolbar and provides a breakdown using Navigation Timings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
•  Instant Tracking of Load Time: Quickly see page load times right in your toolbar.
•  Navigation Events Timeline: Get an intuitive visualization of navigation events with a clear timeline view.
•  Critical Rendering Path: Easily visualize the key metrics related to the critical rendering path to identify optimization opportunities.
•  Extraction of Raw Data: Seamlessly copy raw performance data to your clipboard for further analysis.

The extension provides an instant and intuitive snapshot of a page's load performance, serving as an excellent starting point for a more in-depth performance analysis.
